communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Correspondence with Ocean Exploration Trust
communications.communication:
To whom it may concern,

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All correspondence between NOAA and Ocean Exploration Trust and/or the Nautilus Exploration Program generated from May 1, 2025, until the time this request is ultimately fulfilled.

Please include as responsive:

1. Communications - any and all communications with Ocean Exploration Trust representatives, which may include:

• postal mail
• reports
• bulletins
• agreements
• memorandums of understanding
• meeting agendas or minutes
• presentations
• phone logs
• chats and meeting logs from virtual meeting and collaboration platforms (including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Slack, WebEx, and similar platforms)
• text messages (including messages from default texting applications or encrypted messaging apps such as Signal or WhatsApp)
• emails (including body, subject line, and any and all attachments contained therein) between NOAA and @oceanexplorationtrust.org email domains

The category for this request is Media. I am a journalist with work that has appeared in Slate, Sierra, Floodlight and other publications, and I am requesting this information in that capacity.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by email attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. Please provide a tracking number and an estimated date of completion for the responsive documents.

Sincerely,

Elyse Hauser
